name: @nitive/whitepaper-react

scripts.commonjs: cp -rf src commonjs && babel --config-file ./babel.commonjs.js commonjs -d commonjs
scripts.modules: cp -rf src modules && babel --config-file ./babel.modules.js modules -d modules
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run generate && npm run commonjs && npm run modules

description: React components automatically generated by whitepaper-bem
author: @nitive
